biotools.summary: The semantic comparisons of Gene Ontology (GO) annotations provide quantitative ways to compute similarities between genes and gene groups, and have became an important basis for many bioinformatics analysis approaches. This R package analyzes the semantic similarity computation among GO terms, sets of GO terms, gene products and gene clusters.

bioschemas.name: GOSemSim
